Text.Value: I'm ready - I think. Am I? Yes.
You will fight with us won't you?
You got it, chum. I'll mark your map, in case you get lost.
You were something else, out in the shadows. Won't forget it, that's for damn sure.

EditorData.logicalname: Back at inn - Has not met

Text.Value: Join us, and we'll take that convoy down. It's the only way to survive the curse.
We survived one attack. I don't know if we can survive another.
All right. But hurry it along, yeah?
You're too late - I've encountered the convoy, led by a drider.
But - try not to get lost. Frightful weather out there.

EditorData.NodeContext: A little cheeky. The cursed shadows could kill you!

Text.Value: Go on ahead. I'll catch up.
Jaheira says wait. So we wait.

EditorData.logicalname: Waiting next to inn - Has met

Text.Value: It's all up to you, chum. But no pressure.
It's all up to you, then. Do us proud.
Reckon you're our last hope. But can't say I'm worried.
There's a cultist convoy that brings supplies and personnel to the tower - by some strange magic, they move through the curse unharmed.
I'll miss that magic wall. But no Isobel - no protection.
Damn. You're lucky to be in one piece.
But the curse is at its strongest between here and there. You won't even reach the tower unless you can survive the darkest shadows.
That's where we come in.
Take a stroll, have a drink. Enjoy them while you can.

EditorData.logicalname: Waiting next to inn - Has not met

Text.Value: You got it. Here - I'll mark your map. But don't keep me waiting.
I need time to prepare.
Let's do it. You lead, I follow.
Heard you're planning to infiltrate Moonrise, and take the fight to Ketheric. That'd be a tale for the ages.

EditorData.logicalname: Waiting at bridge - Has not met

Text.Value: With your help, we'll ambush them, and seize their secret. When we do, it's yours, and the path to Moonrise will be open.

Synopsis: A Harper, getting ready for a mission that will see them trying to kill a drider - a big, dangerous monster. Main path only available when group dialogue is unavailable. This Harper is boisterous and eager.
